name: Out of Time (itch) (Graham Dolle)
description:
Out of Time is a game about fighting your nature. I would say more about the specific story but it will come through better in the final product <3. On that note if you're on this page then you are playing a very early demo of the game so there are lots of rough corners at the moment.

You may contact me at graham.p.sullivan@gmail.com or on twitter @cbear_wallis

Thanks for playing! <3

general controls:

Arrow Keys, C, and X

C confirms on menus

Escape to pause and hold R to restart
